front.title: Getting started with the NIST cybersecuity framework

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Document translated courtesy of Danylo Mialkovskyi, Oleksandr Bakalynskyi, Illia Vysotskyi, Maryna Vosmeryk, Anastasiia Korostelkina, Illia Zuzin and Viktoria Shmalenuk. Reviewed by Diplomatic Language Services. Official U.S. Government translation. The official English language version of this publication is available free of charge from NIST at https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.1271.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
